name: Patrologia latina-dev
tagline: Machine-corrected versions of selections of the Patrologia Latina.
body:
#Welcome to patrologia_latina-dev!

##About
This repository does not contain the full collection but those works which haven't already been covered by our [CSEL digitisation effort](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/csel-dev). 
A Wikipedia link to this repository can be viewed [here](https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Patrologia_Latina).

##Contents
These XML files were produced by data entry company [Jouve](http://www.jouve.com/en) who OCR'd, corrected and encoded the text in accordance with the latest [EpiDoc](http://sourceforge.net/p/epidoc/wiki/Home/) standards. While the initial results are adequate, more can and should be done to improve the XML.

The following are the PL works we have digitised. As previously stated, works you don't find here can be accessed over at our CSEL repository.
